item.title: How To Get An Axe (And Chop Grass) In Grounded 2
item.description:
In a crafting-survival game like Grounded 2 , it's crucial to have the right tools to interact with the environment. As a human shrunk into a bug-sized being, players must navigate through the wild area of a park from the point of view of a little critter. This is why items involved in survival in Grounded 2 are things that seem big for a bug, like grass and dandelions. Before being able to chop grass and other weeds, players must know how to get an Axe to chop grass in Grounded 2 .

How To Get An Axe (Omni-Tool) In Grounded 2

To get an Axe in Grounded 2 , players must find the Ranger Outpost: Snackbar , then pick up the Omni-Axe from the wall. This will be the first Omni-Tool players unlock in Grounded 2 , and it's the first step to unlocking the rest of the equipment.

How To Chop Grass In Grounded 2

To chop grass in Grounded 2 , simply approach the grass and press the chop button after obtaining the Axe . You don't need to equip the Axe , as it'll automatically be equipped when interacting with the correct object.

Chopping normal grass will yield Grass Plank, but there are other plants to chop, like dandelions, flowers, weeds, and so on.

How To Get Dry Grass Chunk In Grounded 2

To get Dry Grass Chunk in Grounded 2 , players can either chop Dry Grass or harvest Dry Grass Chunk from the ground ​​​​​​. Dry Grass Chunk plant can be found near the Ranger Outpost: Snackbar, making it easy to find when the mission requires it.

Meanwhile, chop-able Dry Grass can be found individually around the park, but there are areas where a bunch of Dry Grass are wilting. For example, the spot east of the Ominent Boarding Facility, west of Ranger Outpost: Snackbar, south of the Ceremony Pamphlet.

How To Find The Ranger Outpost In Grounded 2

Finding a Ranger Outpost is part of the One Tool to Rule Them All mission in Grounded 2 . It might get overwhelming with the many tasks appearing at the same time, but to put it simply, Ranger Outpost: Snackbar is located east of the Ominent Onboarding Facility.

After entering the place and getting the Omni-Axe, there will be a call from the room across, but it's locked. To reach this room and unlock the Ranger Station, players must exit the outpost, find a cave outside, and then access the locked room from the route through the cave (there will be a quest marker for this, too). The locked door can be unlocked on the other side, so the entire outpost can be accessed easily after that.

The Ranger Station is useful for unlocking new items, crafting Omni-Tools, and upgrading equipment, such as the Axe, Wrench, and Shovel. For that, it's important to know the nearest Ranger Station from the base, so that it's easier to access higher-tier tools later.

item.title: Violence District Killer and Survivor Tier List
item.description:
Since Violence District is a 1 vs all type of game, you have to survive by running away from killers. And although your skill plays an important role, you can significantly increase your chances with the help of perks and items. Therefore, in this killer and survivor Tier List, we have ranked all the items from best to worst in Violence District .

While killers can choose different characters with unique abilities, survivors use perks and items to create a unique build. But not all of them are equally powerful in this Roblox game.

How to Unlock Killers and Survivor Items

While playing Violence District , you will have to complete different tasks depending on your role. Killers must kill all the survivors, while the latter must escape from the map. To do this, they will have to complete tasks, such as fixing generators. Also, for each winning round, you will earn money and EXP needed to unlock new features.

Perks become available after reaching a certain level in Violence District . In the case of items and Killers, you will have to spend in-game currency to unlock them. However, it is worth noting that some perks and items are more effective than others in this Roblox game. Therefore, we recommend that you take a look at our Violence District Tier Lists, in which we have ranked all the items of killers and survivors.

Killers Tier List

Killers

Tier

The Hidden

S Tier

The Slasher

The Masked

A Tier

The Abysswalker

Survivors Tier List

Survivors Items and Perks Tier
Parrying Dagger Item S Tier
Time to Grow Up Perk S Tier
Great Collapse Perk S Tier
High Karma Perk S Tier
Grab My Hand Perk S Tier

Flashlight Item A Tier
On My Own Perk A Tier
Pacifist Perk B Tier
Gate Item B Tier
Snake Step Perk B Tier
Heads Up Perk B Tier
Motion Tracker Item B Tier
Twist of Fate Item B Tier
Nobody Left Behind C Tier
Left Behind C Tier
We’re Stronger Together C Tier

Best Killers and Survivors in Violence District

If you want to become a real nightmare on the map in Violence District , then you should pay attention to these killers:

  1. The Hidden - The best killer in this Roblox game, thanks to his mobility. In addition, he can become completely invisible when standing still.
  2. The Slasher - This killer is more suitable for aggressive pursuits and is also available from the beginning of the game.

As for the survivors role, builds can differ depending on the preferred playstyle. But we highly recommend you master the Parrying Dagger item. With the right timing, you will be able to parry any attacks from the Killers.

item.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Receives Final Surprise Update for July 2025
item.description:
Developer Sledgehammer Games has surprised fans and released one final update for its 2023 shooter, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 . The unexpected patch, which includes some big weapon changes, is available to download now on all supported platforms and comes just hours after both Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Modern Warfare 2 were separated from the Call of Duty HQ app.

Although its multiplayer was heavily praised by the Call of Duty community, Modern Warfare 3 reviews were largely negative when it launched in 2023, mainly due to its lackluster single-player campaign. It is now one of the worst-reviewed Call of Duty titles in history, as fans blasted the game's incredibly short campaign, with some even labeling it as a "DLC" for its predecessor, 2022's Modern Warfare 2 . With that being said, Modern Warfare 3 was praised by fans for its fast-paced movement updates, including the return of slide-canceling, iconic map remasters from the original Modern Warfare 2 , longer time-to-kill, and more.

On July 29, Activision confirmed it would be removing both Modern Warfare 2 and Modern Warfare 3 from the Call of Duty HQ app. Fans were hoping that this was the beginning of the end for the controversial feature, but it looks like the publisher is merely freeing up space for the launch of Black Ops 7 later this year. The good news, however, is that Modern Warfare 3 's removal from the HQ app has been accompanied by a surprise final update. According to the patch notes, which can be found further down this article, the update makes some big changes to the Reclaimer 18 Shotgun, the Rival-9 Submachine Gun, and more.

While Black Ops 7 is on the horizon, Modern Warfare 3 still has an active community that jumps into the game's multiplayer on a regular basis. So, fans will be pleased to know that a handful of popular weapons have now received some fresh adjustments. Modern Warfare 3 's Reclaimer 18 Shotgun, which has dominated lobbies for a long time with its JAK Devestator Kit, has received a big nerf, decreasing its maximum damage from 80 to just 25, its near-medium damage from 51 to 15, and more. The JAK Headhunter Kit for the Rival-9 Submachine Gun has also received a substantial nerf, with decreases to its medium damage, minimum damage, and headshot damage multiplier.

According to the official patch notes, Sledgehammer Games will also be adding new Armory Unlock challenges to the game in the coming days. This means numerous different weapons, such as the DTIR 30-06 Battle Rifle and Kastov LSW Light Machine Gun, and a handful of Conversion Kits, will all receive new challenges within the Armory Unlock. For those who might be unaware, weapons and Conversion Kits that were once available in seasonal Battle Passes are eventually moved to the Armory Unlock, where players must complete challenges to unlock them.

Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Final Update Patch Notes

Reclaimer 18 (Shotgun)

JAK Devastator (Conversion Kit)

  • Decreased maximum damage from 80 to 25
  • Decreased near-medium damage from 51 to 15
  • Decreased minimum damage from 25 to 10
  • Decreased rate of fire by 21%
  • Decreased sprint-to-fire time by 8%
  • Increased hipfire spread by 12%

Rival-9 (Submachine Gun)

JAK Headhunter (Conversion Kit)

  • Decreased headshot damage multiplier from 2x to 1.45x
  • Decreased medium damage 30 to 28
  • Decreased minimum damage from 28 to 24
  • Increased burst-fire delay from 66ms to 90ms

Armory Unlocks

Lastly, new Challenges will become available in the coming days.

  • DTIR 30-06 (Battle Rifle)
  • Kastov LSW (Light Machine Gun)
  • JAK Lance (MX Guardian Conversion Kit)
  • JAK Voltstorm (Stormender Conversion Kit)
  • JAK Salvo (KATT-AMR Conversion Kit)
